page.title: 09POTADOWN COLLEGE.
page.content: In {1985}work has been started on a new extension at Portadown College. The extension scheme was originally programmed to start in February 1975 but now ten years later,with the approval of the {Department of {Education}and a tender of {Â£1,200,000} from D.&R.Martin being accepted,the work is proceeding. When the scheme is completed the existing accomodation will be increased by a {large sports hall and {a new two storey block. The new block will include a library,a sixth form centre,a technology lab,two T.D.G.C.rooms,one home economics room and four classrooms. The existing library will be converted into a {COMPUTER RESOURCES {AREA. }
